description: Add Storybook devDependencies, create .storybook/main.ts and preview.ts, add storybook scripts to package.json

title: Create SearchBar component + story
description: SearchBar with value, onSubmit (Enter), onChange, and optional onClear. Include story.

title: Create TabBar component + story
description: TabBar with Discover/Watchlist tabs, activeTab and onTabChange props. Include story.

title: Create shared types (src/types.ts)
description: Define MediaType, Tab, Ratings, and MediaItem types in src/types.ts

title: Create fixture data (src/lib/fixtures.ts)
description: Create mock MediaItem objects for stories: movie, TV show, no poster, no ratings, long title variants

title: Create ScoreBadge component + story
description: ScoreBadge component with score and size props. Color: green >=70, yellow >=50, red <50. Include Storybook story.

title: Create RatingDisplay component + story
description: RatingDisplay component showing a single rating source (RT, IMDb, etc.) with label, value, score, and optional subtext. Include story.

title: Create RatingsBar component + story
description: RatingsBar component rendering a row of RatingDisplay components from a Ratings object. Include story.

title: Create PosterImage component + story
description: PosterImage component with 2:3 aspect ratio, placeholder fallback for missing images, sm/md/lg sizes. Include story.

title: Create MediaCard component + story
description: MediaCard showing poster, title, year, normalized score badge, and add/remove action button. Include story with fixture data.

title: Create MediaDetail component + story
description: Full detail view: poster, plot overview, ratings bar, trailer embed, add/remove action, close button. Include story.
